Posts.Content: Ito was on bio identical hormone therapy and was diagnosed with Hormone positive breast cancer in Dec 2010. I opted to treat it aggressively with a double mastectomy. Was on Tamoxifen and tan Arimidex but decided to quiet all cancer medications this week. It has been a year since I suffered bleeding in my left eye and two weeks later had a hypertensive crisis and ended up in the ER. I am now on three melds two control the hypertension. For me at 60 years of age quality of life is important and I did not realize how much the cancer Medes were robbing me of my life. However, it is a personal choice and every women needs to make their own choice based on their life story. J
Posts.Title: Are you Estrogen positive Breast cancer and think you know what caused it?

Posts.Content: No I have not heard anything about a class action law suit.  I do know that the state of TN actually closed down a number of HRC clinics because the doctor was making false claims.  The problem is that your body does not know if the estrogen source is so called "natural" or not because to your body estrogen from what every source is still estrogen.  J
